email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Steel Coils Shipment from Busan to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to ship 12,500MT of steel coils from Busan to Los Angeles on CIF terms. Could you provide a suitable vessel and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Carlos Mendez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Steel Coils Shipment from Busan to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Hi Carlos,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel PACIFIC TRADER (DWT: 85,000, LOA: 225m) for this shipment. The starting freight quote is USD 45.50 per MT. Laycan is 25-30 Nov. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily Zhang

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Steel Coils Shipment from Busan to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 45.50 seems a bit high. Could you provide more details on the vessel's specifications and the demurrage rate? Also, is there any flexibility in the freight rate?

Best regards,
Carlos Mendez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Steel Coils Shipment from Busan to Los Angeles - Additional Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Carlos,

The PACIFIC TRADER has a DWT of 85,000 and LOA of 225m. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day. Considering your concerns, I can revise the freight quote to USD 44.75 per MT. Does this meet your requirements?

Best regards,
Emily Zhang

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Steel Coils Shipment from Busan to Los Angeles - Additional Details
email_chain.body:
Emily,

USD 44.75 is better. Can we push it to USD 44.00? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 27 Nov - 2 Dec?

Best regards,
Carlos Mendez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Steel Coils Shipment from Busan to Los Angeles - Final Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Carlos,

USD 44.00 is possible. Laycan adjusted to 27 Nov - 2 Dec. Please confirm.

Best regards,
Emily Zhang

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Steel Coils Shipment from Busan to Los Angeles - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Best regards,
Carlos Mendez

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - PACIFIC TRADER
email_chain.body:
Hi Carlos,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: PACIFIC TRADER
- Cargo: 12,500MT Steel Coils
- Load Port: Busan
- Discharge Port: Los Angeles
- Laycan: 27 Nov - 2 Dec
- Freight: USD 44.00 per MT
- Demurrage: USD 12,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best regards,
Emily Zhang

email_chain.subject: Re: Summary of Terms - PACIFIC TRADER
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Looks good. Just one thing: can we confirm the loading window is 48 hours?

Best regards,
Carlos Mendez

email_chain.subject: Re: Summary of Terms - PACIFIC TRADER
email_chain.body:
Hi Carlos,

Yes, loading window is 48 hours. All other terms remain as per the summary. Let me know if you need anything else.

Best regards,
Emily Zhang
